Hackathon Wins

#1 True Challange 2018

#1 Hlsngbrg Innovation Challenge by VentureLab

2 wins out of 3 attended

StudentValvet

Description

StudentValvet is a Discord community for students with its main focus is helping students finding internships. The website needed to have a landing page to funnel in students to become customers.

AMS Core

Description

AMS Core is a B2B Accessibility Management Systemet for property owners. On AMS a user can add their property accessibility and data manage it in one place.

AMS Widget

Description

AMS Widget is an accessibility info widget that property owners can embed on their websites. This will display useful property accessibility info for end users.

Handiscover

Description

Handiscover is a book accessible accommodations website. Similar like Booking.com but with accessibility data attached to each property.

Mutepod

Description

Mutepod is a B2B company specializing in offering sound-reduced booths for offices. The website needed to display its products and be able to receive inquiries from customers.

SHAO

Description

Sveriges Funktionshinderanpassnings Organisation (SHAO) is a non-profit organization whose goal is to simplify everyday life for people with different disabilities. They oversee, map and certify premises that are accessible for people with disabilities.

MLB Truck kompetens

Description

MLB Truck kompetens offers truck training. This website needed to be able to recieve bookings with a payment integration. Its purpose of the website was to function as a redirecting booking website from the actual website. WooCommerce was used for this website with Klarna as a payment gateway.

Carpro Sverige

Description

Carpro is a global company offering car care and detailing products. It's a E-Commerce website for their swedish market. It's is build in Quickbutik which is similar as Shopify.

Bedcapsules

Description

Bedcapsules offers sleeping accommodations at airports. The website purpose is to function as a booking site and displaying general information about the company and service it provides.

Filip's portfolio website

Description

The current website you're on is my portfolio and it's build in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and designed in Figma.

Nya Kompisbyrån

Description

Nya Kompisbyrån is a non-partisan and non-religious non-profit organization that aims to increase community in society between new and established Swedes. My assignment was to be a volunteer Wordpress developer, assess the UX of the website, propose improvements and implement them.

Webbogram

Description

Webbogram is a social media marketing agency. The website needed to be very simple with only their slogan and contact info.
